channel.title: Starting look error, som1, just any1, please help

item.title: Starting look error, som1, just any1, please help
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

I edited Starting look of players (not the equipment!) no compile errors, and the starting outfit works, but if i change my look to something else, then save my game and logg out, when i logg back in im back 2 the starting look! Does anyone know how to fix this??

Heres the things i changed [code] //Setting player standard look
playerLook[0] = 0;
playerLook[1] = 7;
playerLook[2] = 8;
playerLook[3] = 9;
playerLook[4] =5;
playerLook[5] = 0;

	/*playerLook[0] = 1;
	playerLook[1] = 5;
	playerLook[2] = 5;
	playerLook[3] = 6;
	playerLook[4] = 5;
	playerLook[5] = 10;*/

	//Giving the player an unique look
	playerEquipment[playerHat]=6109;
	playerEquipment[playerCape]=6111;
	playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1704;
	playerEquipment[playerChest]=6107;
	playerEquipment[playerShield]=3842;
	playerEquipment[playerLegs]=6108;
	playerEquipment[playerHands]=6110;
	playerEquipment[playerFeet]=6106;
	playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
	playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1323;

/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/

	pHead=50;
	pTorso=56;
	pArms=61;
	pHands=67;
	pLegs=70;
	pFeet=79;
	pBeard=-1;
            pBeard=-1; [/code] Just changed the look and added it so you start out wearing full ghostly, notihng out of the ordinary, so whats wrong?? <Project Czar / Edge City Source >

EDIT: If i have 2 i will post pic although it wont really explain much better.
